mutants.code:
def maxSubArraySum(a):
    n = len(a)
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = max(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    total_sum = sum(a)
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = -a[i]
    min_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum - min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)

    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum * min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    n = len(a)
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = max(a[i], current_sum - a[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    total_sum = sum(a)
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = -a[i]
    min_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum + min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    n = len(a)
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = max(a[i], current_sum * a[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    total_sum = sum(a)
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = -a[i]
    min_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum + min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    n = len(a)
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = max(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    total_sum = sum(a)
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = -a[i]
    min_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum - a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum + min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    n = len(a)
    max_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = max(a[i], current_sum + a[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    total_sum = sum(a)
    for i in range(n):
        a[i] = -a[i]
    min_sum = a[0]
    current_sum = a[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        current_sum = min(a[i], current_sum * a[i])
        min_sum = min(min_sum, current_sum)
    circular_max_sum = total_sum + min_sum
    return max(max_sum, circular_max_sum)
